amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide by $10 million and increases funds for Prostate Cancer research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide by $10 million and to increase funds for Defense Health Program, Operation and Maintenance by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
